import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-detail', templateUrl: './contact-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-detail.component.css'] }) export class ContactDetailComponent { contact: Contact = { id: 1, name: 'R. Kent Jackson', email: 'email.com', phone: '208-496-3771', imageUrl: '../../assets/images/jacksonk.jpg', group: null } }
